title: No news of my Pixel 3 RMA
content:
Hello,
It has been one month that I have sent back my Pixel 3 to google Support after they sent me the UPS label. After asking 2 times the support I haven't got a propoer answer.
I'm a bit worried about when I will see my phone again.
Is it normal to have such a long time? This is a first time I see a support that long for a RMA.

Thanks in advance
